name: Cursor's Quest 2
description: Cursor's Quest 2 is a simple, yet engaging adventure of forests, dungeons, monsters, keys, and a powerful, golden medallion. As the successor to the original Cursor's Quest, it changes many aspects of the game. The original, a 2D game, was programming completely in p5.js and resembled an early Atari game. Now, Cursor's Quest has experienced rebirth in the world of 3D.
